author: mmusich
body:
Closes https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/27

#### PR description:

Copy `TrackerTopology` as a workaround to use it in `TrackerOfflineValidationSummary::endJob` as suggested in https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/27#issuecomment-919375252 (there are no IOVs for TrackerTopology, it only changes between phase-0, phase-1 and phase-2, while this module is always run on a few consecutive runs, so that should be safe).
Implementation closely follows a similar case https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33998. 

#### PR validation:

It compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: finalize esConsumes migration of `TrackerOfflineValidationSummary`
